医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
对Kiyohiko Sugano教授对药物吸收和预测建模的见解了解药物的吸收和预测建模如何推动药物和精度医学的进步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/insights-into-into-drug-absorption-and-pridective-modeling-with-professor-kiyohiko-sugano.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/insights-into-into-into-drug-absorption-and-pridective-modeling-with-professor-kiyohiko-sugano.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13486528-9676-4974-a68f-e60761b6f480 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 11:03:00 -0400 Insights into drug absorption and predictive modeling with Professor Kiyohiko Sugano
大麻的使用是为了增加年轻人的心脏病发作风险现在，大麻在许多地方是合法的，但是安全吗？两项新的研究增加了越来越多的证据，表明使用大麻的人比不使用这种药物的人，即使在年轻人和其他健康的成年人中也更有可能遭受心脏病发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/cannabis-use-found-found-to-raise-to-raise-hert-antack-risk-risk-among-younger-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/cannabis-use-found-found-to-raise-raise-hert-antack-risk-risk-arisk-among-younger-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62ED954C-66FD-4E9D-83CB-0A46A2B9A6B8 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 10:40:36 -0400 Cannabis use found to raise heart attack risk among younger adults
基于AI的神经网络彻底改变了癌症治疗预测基于初始的人工智能（AI）神经网络可以快速分析和解释患者样品中的数百万个细胞，从而预测组织中的分子变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/ai-base---neal-neal-network-revolutions-cancer-wartement-predictions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/ai-base---------------------- and-neur-network-revolutions-cancer-treatment-predictions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1Ae824df-e273-43cd-85De-068A1937C502 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 10:38:18 -0400 AI-based neural network revolutionizes cancer treatment predictions
乳腺癌手术后证明对淋巴水肿有效的淋巴结转移一项来自芬兰的多中心研究表明，淋巴结转移是一种可行的治疗方法，可用于乳腺癌手术后受影响的肢体肿胀（一种称为淋巴水肿）的肿胀。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/lymph-node-node-transfer-proven-effer-for-lymphedema-after-after-fer-breast-cancer-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/lymph-node-node-transfer-proven-effer-for-lymphedema-after-fer-fer-breast-cancer-surery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43582E11-1B0A-4F04-A1BB-A5C400EC7D1B Tue, 18 Mar 2025 10:22:00 -0400 Lymph node transfer proven effective for lymphedema after breast cancer surgery
橡胶手的幻觉会降低疼痛强度研究人员进行了一个实验，在该实验中，测试对象感觉就像是橡胶手是他们自己身体的一部分。结果，他们自己的手变得不太敏感疼痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/rubber hand-illuse-can-decrease-pain-pain-intenty.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/rubber hand-illush-can-decrease-pain-pain-intsity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79E23C3C-3C7E-4EA-4EAC-8A01-12E0196D7726 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 10:15:14 -0400 Rubber hand illusion can decrease pain intensity
较低剂量的抗生素强力霉素可为脱发有效治疗一项新研究显示，少量常见的抗生素和抗炎药可以遏制免疫反应（例如自身免疫性）会导致永久脱发的症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/lower-doses-of-antibiotic-doxycycline-doxycycline-offer-effective-treatment-treatment-for-alopecia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/lower-doses-of-antibiotic-doxycycline-doxycycline offer-effective-treatment-treatment-for-alopecia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f947b6bb-a94e-4f93-9841-4c120fab788f Tue, 18 Mar 2025 10:09:57 -0400 Lower doses of antibiotic doxycycline offer effective treatment for alopecia
生物制造平台为合成基于肽的药品提供了可持续的替代品为了解决药物访问的不平等，尤其是在发展中国家的社会问题，渥太华大学的本科生研究人员团队开发了一个名为Phytogene的新生物制造平台。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/biomanufacturing-platform-counters-austabainable-antertable-anternative-anternative-to-to-to-synthesy-to-synthesignation-pharmaceuticals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/biomanufacturing-platform-formers-austable--sustabainable-anternative-ternation-to-to-anternative-to-synthesignation-to-synthesized-pharmaceuticals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7E677FCC-8666-4C7E-A206-09B880B29416 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 09:35:00 -0400 Biomanufacturing platform offers a sustainable alternative to synthesizing peptide-based pharmaceuticals
与中风患者胃活性受损相关的自主神经功能障碍缺血性中风后患者常见胃肠道并发症。胃运动受胃速度制造活性（也称为胃肌电活动（GMA））和自主功能来调节。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/autonic-dysfunction-linked-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-impaired-gastric-activity-in-stroke-in-STROKE-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/autonic-dysfunction-linked-to-to-to-to-to-to-impriaged-to-impaired-gastric-activity-in-stroke-in-stroke-stroke-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A05EDD2E-FFE9-4B7A-BC2E-BC2E-BD784EDCE625 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 09:29:35 -0400 Autonomic dysfunction linked to impaired gastric activity in stroke patients
游戏化的移动健康应用程序旨在帮助MS管理疲劳的人发表在多发性硬化症和相关疾病中的一项新研究突出了更多耐力的潜力，这是一种游戏化的移动健康（MHealth）应用程序，旨在帮助多发性硬化症（MS）管理疲劳，这是该疾病的最常见且令人衰弱的症状之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/gamified-mobile-health-app-designed-to-help-people-with-ms-manage-fatigue.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/gamified-mobile-health-app-designed-to-help-people-with-ms-manage-manage-fatigue.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6368C1E6-50D2-4CC4-8243-D71B209B209BD630 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 08:49:00 -0400 Gamified mobile health app designed to help people with MS manage fatigue
新方法导致儿童早期自闭症诊断儿童健康服务与专业护理之间的更紧密合作为自闭症幼儿提供了更快的支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/new-apphack-results-in-earlier-autism-diarism-diarism-diarism--for-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/new-apphack-results-in-earlier-autism-diarism-diarism-diarism-diarism--for-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1E5C0A5-A264-4968-97BE-AE41A7E09960 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 08:32:47 -0400 New approach results in earlier autism diagnosis for children
